title: [Spicers' Sea, Abyssal Cleft]
description: As it delves deeper, the dry path twists between towering rock formations spotted with algae.  Their sheer faces are slick with seaspray raining down from above in cold, stinging droplets.  Squid swim past to either side, tentacles occasionally breaching through the imperceptible walls holding back the unimaginable force of the sea.
